attributes.action: stop prescriptions charges for people who are on life long medication for cholesterol or reduce the cost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More people are now having to take medication for high cholesterol, however for some of us it is not diet related but inherited (Homozygous familial hypercholesterolaemia). For this group of people, treatment is life long, as diet does not reduce the cholesterol levels. Please consider removing the costs for these kinds of prescriptions as at £7.10 per month it is a high cost to pay for life to remain healthy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
